title: State of Crypto Adoption Report - June 2025
summary: Comprehensive analysis reveals mixed adoption trends across major blockchains in June 2025, with Solana and Tron leading in daily active users while Ethereum dominated absolute TVL growth amid the stablecoin narrative. Notable underperformers included Berachain and Sonic in both TVL and stablecoin metrics, while BSC continued to lead in protocol fee growth for the second consecutive month.

title: Veda Multichain Yield Vault Shows Exceptional Growth Following $18M Series A
summary: Veda, a multichain yield vault protocol that secured $18 million in Series A funding last month, demonstrated impressive outperformance in both percentage and absolute USD terms for TVL growth. This significant traction positions Veda as a notable emerging player in the multichain DeFi ecosystem.
